      • createConfiguration

        public ConfigurationResponse createConfiguration(ConfigurationRequest request)
                                          throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException,
                                                 AuthorizationException
        Creates a configuration.

        This implementation ensures the authenticated user is authorized to create the new configuration based on the details of what properties are being changed and the authorizations the authenticated user has been granted.

        Example

        • If the user is attempting to change a service-level configuration that user must be granted the SERVICE_MODIFY_CONFIGS privilege (authorization)
        • If the user is attempting to change the cluster-wide value to enable or disable auto-start (cluster-env/recovery_enabled), that user must be granted the CLUSTER_MANAGE_AUTO_START privilege (authorization)
        Specified by:
        createConfiguration in interface AmbariManagementController
        Parameters:
        request - the request object which defines the configuration.
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - when the configuration cannot be created.
        AuthorizationException

      • validateClusterName

        public static void validateClusterName(String clusterName)
        validate cluster name character and length requirements and throw IllegalArgumentException if not valid.

        Character Requirements

        A through Z a through z 0 through 9 _ (underscore) - (dash) Length Requirements

        Minimum: 1 character Maximum: 100 characters

        Parameters:
        clusterName - name to validate
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if validation result
        See Also:
        CLUSTER_NAME_VALIDATION_REGEXP

      • isAttributeMapsEqual

        public boolean isAttributeMapsEqual(Map<String,Map<String,String>> requestConfigAttributes,
                                    Map<String,Map<String,String>> clusterConfigAttributes)
        Comparison of two attributes maps
        Parameters:
        requestConfigAttributes - - attribute map sent from API

      • validateAuthorizationToUpdateServiceUsersAndGroups

        protected void validateAuthorizationToUpdateServiceUsersAndGroups(Cluster cluster,
                                                                  String configType,
                                                                  Map<String,String[]> propertyChanges)
                                                           throws AuthorizationException
        Validates that the authenticated user can set a service's (run-as) user and group.

        If the user is authorized to set service users and groups, than this method exits quickly. If the user is not authorized to set service users and groups, then this method verifies that the properties of types USER and GROUP have not been changed. If they have been, an AuthorizationException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        cluster - the relevant cluster
        configType - the changed configuration type
        propertyChanges - a map of the property changes for the relevant configuration type
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if the user is not authorized to perform this operation

      • validateAuthorizationToManageServiceAutoStartConfiguration

        protected void validateAuthorizationToManageServiceAutoStartConfiguration(Cluster cluster,
                                                                          String configType,
                                                                          Map<String,String[]> propertyChanges)
                                                                   throws AuthorizationException
        Validates that the authenticated user can manage the cluster-wide configuration for a service's ability to be set to auto-start.

        If the user is authorized, than this method exits quickly. If the user is not authorized, then this method verifies that the configuration property cluster-env/recovery_enabled is not changed. If it was, an AuthorizationException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        cluster - the relevant cluster
        configType - the changed configuration type
        propertyChanges - a map of the property changes for the relevant configuration type
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if the user is not authorized to perform this operation

      • deleteExtensionLink

        public void deleteExtensionLink(ExtensionLinkRequest request)
                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        This method will delete a link between an extension version and a stack version (Extension Link). An extension version is like a stack version but it contains custom services. Linking an extension version to the current stack version allows the cluster to install the custom services contained in the extension version.
        Specified by:
        deleteExtensionLink in interface AmbariManagementController
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if we fail to unlink the extension from the stack

      • createExtensionLink

        public void createExtensionLink(ExtensionLinkRequest request)
                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        This method will create a link between an extension version and a stack version (Extension Link). An extension version is like a stack version but it contains custom services. Linking an extension version to the current stack version allows the cluster to install the custom services contained in the extension version.
        Specified by:
        createExtensionLink in interface AmbariManagementController
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if we fail to link the extension to the stack
